<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A span can either represent a single span of memory pages with size declared</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// by span&#95;map&#95;count configuration variable, or a set of spans in a continuous</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// region, a super span. Any reference to the term &quot;span&quot; usually refers to both</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a single span or a super span. A super span can further be divided into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// multiple spans (or this, super spans), where the first (super)span is the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// master and subsequent (super)spans are subspans. The master span keeps track</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of how many subspans that are still alive and mapped in virtual memory, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// once all subspans and master have been unmapped the entire superspan region</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is released and unmapped (on Windows for example, the entire superspan range</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// has to be released in the same call to release the virtual memory range, but</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// individual subranges can be decommitted individually to reduce physical</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// memory use).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/span-t"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/span-t">span&#95;t</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  //! Free list</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1018"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//! Unmap virtual memory</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1019"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  address is the memory address to unmap, as returned from &#95;memory&#95;map</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1020"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  size is the number of bytes to unmap, which might be less than full region</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1021"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  for a partial unmap offset is the offset in bytes to the actual mapped</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1022"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  region, as set by &#95;memory&#95;map release is set to 0 for partial unmap, or size</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1489"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#42;first&#95;block = block&#95;start;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1492"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;block&#95;end =</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1494"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If block size is less than half a memory page, bound init to next memory</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1495"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// page boundary</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1496"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (block&#95;size &lt; (<a href="#a3667b745f7290a10ff5c5a71575533d9">&#95;memory&#95;page&#95;size</a> &gt;&gt; 1)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1680"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Keep master spans that has remaining subspans to avoid dangling them</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2047"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//! Get a span from one of the cache levels (thread cache, reserved, global</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2049"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/span-t">span&#95;t</a> &#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2050" lineLink="#acf65e6242a6d42e38959bac148c7aadc"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="#acf65e6242a6d42e38959bac148c7aadc">&#95;rpmalloc&#95;heap&#95;extract&#95;new&#95;span</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/heap-t">heap&#95;t</a> &#42;heap,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2098"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (span&#95;count &lt;= limit&#95;span&#95;count);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2099"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Final fallback, map in more virtual memory</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2129"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//! Allocate a new heap from newly mapped memory pages</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2131" lineLink="#a648de3a42660a0567102d78aa59ceded"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/heap-t">heap&#95;t</a> &#42;<a href="#a648de3a42660a0567102d78aa59ceded">&#95;rpmalloc&#95;heap&#95;allocate&#95;new</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2132"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Map in pages for a 16 heaps. If page size is greater than required size for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2133"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this, map a page and use first part for heaps and remaining part for spans</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2134"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for allocations. Adds a lot of complexity, but saves a lot of memory on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2135"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// systems where page size &gt; 64 spans (4MiB)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2136"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> heap&#95;size = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/structs/heap-t">heap&#95;t</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2137"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> aligned&#95;heap&#95;size = 16 &#42; ((heap&#95;size + 15) / 16);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2138"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> request&#95;heap&#95;count = 16;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2139"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> heap&#95;span&#95;count = ((aligned&#95;heap&#95;size &#42; request&#95;heap&#95;count) +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2140"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/structs/span-t">span&#95;t</a>) + <a href="#a58df6aa2dfcdd796fd55cd102fdb177f">&#95;memory&#95;span&#95;size</a> - 1) /</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2141"><span class="doxyHighlight">                           <a href="#a58df6aa2dfcdd796fd55cd102fdb177f">&#95;memory&#95;span&#95;size</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2142"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> block&#95;size = <a href="#a58df6aa2dfcdd796fd55cd102fdb177f">&#95;memory&#95;span&#95;size</a> &#42; heap&#95;span&#95;count;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2143"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> span&#95;count = heap&#95;span&#95;count;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2144"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/span-t">span&#95;t</a> &#42;span = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2145"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there are global reserved spans, use these first</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2146"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a19d785146ca5053c2da69ad1ec4de94c">&#95;memory&#95;global&#95;reserve&#95;count</a> &gt;= heap&#95;span&#95;count) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2147"><span class="doxyHighlight">    span = <a href="#a80ccc3407de6606e73356a7c4e2dc6ee">&#95;rpmalloc&#95;global&#95;get&#95;reserved&#95;spans</a>(heap&#95;span&#95;count);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2148"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2149"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!span) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2150"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a3667b745f7290a10ff5c5a71575533d9">&#95;memory&#95;page&#95;size</a> &gt; block&#95;size) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2151"><span class="doxyHighlight">      span&#95;count = <a href="#a3667b745f7290a10ff5c5a71575533d9">&#95;memory&#95;page&#95;size</a> / <a href="#a58df6aa2dfcdd796fd55cd102fdb177f">&#95;memory&#95;span&#95;size</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2152"><span class="doxyHighlight">      block&#95;size = <a href="#a3667b745f7290a10ff5c5a71575533d9">&#95;memory&#95;page&#95;size</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2153"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If using huge pages, make sure to grab enough heaps to avoid</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2154"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reallocating a huge page just to serve new heaps</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2155"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> possible&#95;heap&#95;count =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2156"><span class="doxyHighlight">          (block&#95;size - </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/structs/span-t">span&#95;t</a>)) / aligned&#95;heap&#95;size;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2157"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (possible&#95;heap&#95;count &gt;= (request&#95;heap&#95;count &#42; 16))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2158"><span class="doxyHighlight">        request&#95;heap&#95;count &#42;= 16;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2159"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (possible&#95;heap&#95;count &lt; request&#95;heap&#95;count)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2160"><span class="doxyHighlight">        request&#95;heap&#95;count = possible&#95;heap&#95;count;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2161"><span class="doxyHighlight">      heap&#95;span&#95;count = ((aligned&#95;heap&#95;size &#42; request&#95;heap&#95;count) +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2162"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/structs/span-t">span&#95;t</a>) + <a href="#a58df6aa2dfcdd796fd55cd102fdb177f">&#95;memory&#95;span&#95;size</a> - 1) /</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2163"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        <a href="#a58df6aa2dfcdd796fd55cd102fdb177f">&#95;memory&#95;span&#95;size</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2167"><span class="doxyHighlight">    span = (<a href="/docs/api/structs/span-t">span&#95;t</a> &#42;)<a href="#afb297c8e6c20ce017a62ea42b70be194">&#95;rpmalloc&#95;mmap</a>(block&#95;size, &amp;align&#95;offset);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2168"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!span)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2169"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2170"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2171"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Master span will contain the heaps</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2172"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="#ab51bbcd0d9d41ba9c6f4ad547ba77405">&#95;rpmalloc&#95;stat&#95;inc</a>(&amp;&#95;master&#95;spans);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2182"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (num&#95;heaps &lt; request&#95;heap&#95;count)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2183"><span class="doxyHighlight">    num&#95;heaps = request&#95;heap&#95;count;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2184"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="#aa1ee77cdccf0341222f64395d0be2626">atomic&#95;store32</a>(&amp;heap-&gt;child&#95;count, (int32&#95;t)num&#95;heaps - 1);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2197"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> reserve&#95;count =</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2199"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                   : remain&#95;count);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2200"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/span-t">span&#95;t</a> &#42;remain&#95;span =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2201"><span class="doxyHighlight">        (<a href="/docs/api/structs/span-t">span&#95;t</a> &#42;)<a href="#ab4225911698b67188e1538c334cfe16c">pointer&#95;offset</a>(span, heap&#95;span&#95;count &#42; <a href="#a58df6aa2dfcdd796fd55cd102fdb177f">&#95;memory&#95;span&#95;size</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2202"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="#ae4a00ccf859d64a7519ae121563a56e7">&#95;rpmalloc&#95;heap&#95;set&#95;reserved&#95;spans</a>(heap, span, remain&#95;span, reserve&#95;count);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2203"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2204"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (remain&#95;count &gt; reserve&#95;count) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2557"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((alignment &lt;= <a href="#a645356809d937167848705edabde7d44">SPAN&#95;HEADER&#95;SIZE</a>) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2558"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ((<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmreflect-cpp/#ac934769d93af95250952646a3829df4c">size</a> + <a href="#a645356809d937167848705edabde7d44">SPAN&#95;HEADER&#95;SIZE</a>) &lt; <a href="#a9641beb0030ad56b2df025775823b2af">&#95;memory&#95;medium&#95;size&#95;limit</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2559"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If alignment is less or equal to span header size (which is power of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2560"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// two), and size aligned to span header size multiples is less than size +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2561"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// alignment, then use natural alignment of blocks to provide alignment</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2562"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> multiple&#95;size = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmreflect-cpp/#ac934769d93af95250952646a3829df4c">size</a> ? (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmreflect-cpp/#ac934769d93af95250952646a3829df4c">size</a> + (<a href="#a645356809d937167848705edabde7d44">SPAN&#95;HEADER&#95;SIZE</a> - 1)) &amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2563"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                      ~(uintptr&#95;t)(<a href="#a645356809d937167848705edabde7d44">SPAN&#95;HEADER&#95;SIZE</a> - 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2564"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                : <a href="#a645356809d937167848705edabde7d44">SPAN&#95;HEADER&#95;SIZE</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2565"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="#ad008ddf766a4f56fbde2edf2c51d9a87">rpmalloc&#95;assert</a>(!(multiple&#95;size % <a href="#a645356809d937167848705edabde7d44">SPAN&#95;HEADER&#95;SIZE</a>),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2566"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Failed alignment calculation&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2567"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (multiple&#95;size &lt;= (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmreflect-cpp/#ac934769d93af95250952646a3829df4c">size</a> + alignment))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2569"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2570"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2571"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;ptr = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2572"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> align&#95;mask = alignment - 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2573"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (alignment &lt;= <a href="#a3667b745f7290a10ff5c5a71575533d9">&#95;memory&#95;page&#95;size</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2574"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ptr = <a href="#a3bef7e16a625f1968110eaf331332eb2">&#95;rpmalloc&#95;allocate</a>(heap, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmreflect-cpp/#ac934769d93af95250952646a3829df4c">size</a> + alignment);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2575"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((uintptr&#95;t)ptr &amp; align&#95;mask) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2576"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ptr = (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;)(((uintptr&#95;t)ptr &amp; ~(uintptr&#95;t)align&#95;mask) + alignment);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2577"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Mark as having aligned blocks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2578"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/span-t">span&#95;t</a> &#42;span = (<a href="/docs/api/structs/span-t">span&#95;t</a> &#42;)((uintptr&#95;t)ptr &amp; <a href="#a3f784cd2178650b1990ea81980646a3b">&#95;memory&#95;span&#95;mask</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2579"><span class="doxyHighlight">      span-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/span-t/#a4de89d484559557bb639a2703c750b17">flags</a> |= <a href="#ad1094486bd3e5ee282e7a4ce7de9c7db">SPAN&#95;FLAG&#95;ALIGNED&#95;BLOCKS</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2580"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2581"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ptr;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2582"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2583"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2584"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Fallback to mapping new pages for this request. Since pointers passed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2585"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to rpfree must be able to reach the start of the span by bitmasking of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2586"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the address with the span size, the returned aligned pointer from this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2587"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// function must be with a span size of the start of the mapped area.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2588"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In worst case this requires us to loop and map pages until we get a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2589"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// suitable memory address. It also means we can never align to span size</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2590"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// or greater, since the span header will push alignment more than one</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2591"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// span size away from span start (thus causing pointer mask to give us</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2592"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// an invalid span start on free)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2593"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (alignment &amp; align&#95;mask) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2594"><span class="doxyHighlight">    errno = EINVAL;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2595"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2596"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2597"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (alignment &gt;= <a href="#a58df6aa2dfcdd796fd55cd102fdb177f">&#95;memory&#95;span&#95;size</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2598"><span class="doxyHighlight">    errno = EINVAL;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2599"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2600"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2601"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2602"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> extra&#95;pages = alignment / <a href="#a3667b745f7290a10ff5c5a71575533d9">&#95;memory&#95;page&#95;size</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2603"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2604"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Since each span has a header, we will at least need one extra memory page</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2605"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> num&#95;pages = 1 + (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmreflect-cpp/#ac934769d93af95250952646a3829df4c">size</a> / <a href="#a3667b745f7290a10ff5c5a71575533d9">&#95;memory&#95;page&#95;size</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2606"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmreflect-cpp/#ac934769d93af95250952646a3829df4c">size</a> &amp; (<a href="#a3667b745f7290a10ff5c5a71575533d9">&#95;memory&#95;page&#95;size</a> - 1))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2607"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ++num&#95;pages;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2608"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2609"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (extra&#95;pages &gt; num&#95;pages)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2610"><span class="doxyHighlight">    num&#95;pages = 1 + extra&#95;pages;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2611"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2612"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> original&#95;pages = num&#95;pages;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2613"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> limit&#95;pages = (<a href="#a58df6aa2dfcdd796fd55cd102fdb177f">&#95;memory&#95;span&#95;size</a> / <a href="#a3667b745f7290a10ff5c5a71575533d9">&#95;memory&#95;page&#95;size</a>) &#42; 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2614"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (limit&#95;pages &lt; (original&#95;pages &#42; 2))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2615"><span class="doxyHighlight">    limit&#95;pages = original&#95;pages &#42; 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2616"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2617"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> mapped&#95;size, align&#95;offset;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2618"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/span-t">span&#95;t</a> &#42;span;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2619"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2620"><span class="doxyHighlight">retry:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2621"><span class="doxyHighlight">  align&#95;offset = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2622"><span class="doxyHighlight">  mapped&#95;size = num&#95;pages &#42; <a href="#a3667b745f7290a10ff5c5a71575533d9">&#95;memory&#95;page&#95;size</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2623"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2624"><span class="doxyHighlight">  span = (<a href="/docs/api/structs/span-t">span&#95;t</a> &#42;)<a href="#afb297c8e6c20ce017a62ea42b70be194">&#95;rpmalloc&#95;mmap</a>(mapped&#95;size, &amp;align&#95;offset);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2625"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!span) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2626"><span class="doxyHighlight">    errno = ENOMEM;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2627"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2628"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2629"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ptr = <a href="#ab4225911698b67188e1538c334cfe16c">pointer&#95;offset</a>(span, <a href="#a645356809d937167848705edabde7d44">SPAN&#95;HEADER&#95;SIZE</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2630"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2631"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((uintptr&#95;t)ptr &amp; align&#95;mask)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2632"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ptr = (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;)(((uintptr&#95;t)ptr &amp; ~(uintptr&#95;t)align&#95;mask) + alignment);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2633"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2634"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (((</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)<a href="#af51a6ed47e80b1b57187f1d5be6c8b4c">pointer&#95;diff</a>(ptr, span) &gt;= <a href="#a58df6aa2dfcdd796fd55cd102fdb177f">&#95;memory&#95;span&#95;size</a>) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2635"><span class="doxyHighlight">      (<a href="#ab4225911698b67188e1538c334cfe16c">pointer&#95;offset</a>(ptr, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmreflect-cpp/#ac934769d93af95250952646a3829df4c">size</a>) &gt; <a href="#ab4225911698b67188e1538c334cfe16c">pointer&#95;offset</a>(span, mapped&#95;size)) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2636"><span class="doxyHighlight">      (((uintptr&#95;t)ptr &amp; <a href="#a3f784cd2178650b1990ea81980646a3b">&#95;memory&#95;span&#95;mask</a>) != (uintptr&#95;t)span)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2637"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="#abfbbb8e2f9b086d466fe2898a283c98d">&#95;rpmalloc&#95;unmap</a>(span, mapped&#95;size, align&#95;offset, mapped&#95;size);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2638"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ++num&#95;pages;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2639"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (num&#95;pages &gt; limit&#95;pages) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2640"><span class="doxyHighlight">      errno = EINVAL;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2641"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2642"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2643"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">goto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> retry;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2644"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2649"><span class="doxyHighlight">  span-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/span-t/#a13753de75bc52a5b8a1a9532083c9ba4">align&#95;offset</a> = (uint32&#95;t)align&#95;offset;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2691"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#af8f864d9fe0055b43dc8034fe9060630">UNEXPECTED</a>(span-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/span-t/#abf4fa6f8f0e7baff0d6a7a96df58bcca">used&#95;count</a> == span-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/span-t/#ad842dbc76a30fb5beee77a2d773a3e91">list&#95;size</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2692"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there are no used blocks it is guaranteed that no other external</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2694"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (span-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/span-t/#abf4fa6f8f0e7baff0d6a7a96df58bcca">used&#95;count</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2695"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make sure we have synchronized the deferred list and list size by using</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2696"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// acquire semantics and guarantee that no external thread is accessing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2697"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// span concurrently</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2698"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;free&#95;list;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2699"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">do</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2700"><span class="doxyHighlight">        free&#95;list = <a href="#a00bbb337491324377139681240567490">atomic&#95;exchange&#95;ptr&#95;acquire</a>(&amp;span-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/span-t/#a22b0340927d02f0c7c4486f01c31358e">free&#95;list&#95;deferred</a>,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2723"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The memory ordering here is a bit tricky, to avoid having to ABA protect</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2724"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the deferred free list to avoid desynchronization of list and list size</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2870"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (span-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/span-t/#a5a977febdd2e9ae15bcf66f83d0cf817">size&#95;class</a> == <a href="#a3f84dd23eb0ef3cf54aeb6afff0618ae">SIZE&#95;CLASS&#95;LARGE</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2871"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="#a573fc7baab7be24c6bac115b7f62192f">&#95;rpmalloc&#95;deallocate&#95;large</a>(span);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2877"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2878"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Reallocation entry points</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2879"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2880"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//////</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2881"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2882"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#adc5743a6b15192da5b7e023f85360208">&#95;rpmalloc&#95;usable&#95;size</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;p);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2883"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2884"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//! Reallocate the given block to the given size</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2885" lineLink="#a9942f9f958830d9f83ecf67b85de3ea4"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="#a9942f9f958830d9f83ecf67b85de3ea4">&#95;rpmalloc&#95;reallocate</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/heap-t">heap&#95;t</a> &#42;heap, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;p, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmreflect-cpp/#ac934769d93af95250952646a3829df4c">size</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2886"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> oldsize, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> flags) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2887"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (p) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2888"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Grab the span using guaranteed span alignment</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2889"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/span-t">span&#95;t</a> &#42;span = (<a href="/docs/api/structs/span-t">span&#95;t</a> &#42;)((uintptr&#95;t)p &amp; <a href="#a3f784cd2178650b1990ea81980646a3b">&#95;memory&#95;span&#95;mask</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2890"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a90593dceacf0c04f14d084bed7e7eabe">EXPECTED</a>(span-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/span-t/#a5a977febdd2e9ae15bcf66f83d0cf817">size&#95;class</a> &lt; <a href="#aa74d427b2b9955ff2d9719693d9fc80e">SIZE&#95;CLASS&#95;COUNT</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2891"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Small/medium sized block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2892"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="#ad008ddf766a4f56fbde2edf2c51d9a87">rpmalloc&#95;assert</a>(span-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/span-t/#ae77d9a2cdd2a2fd46e3b27739d6c88cc">span&#95;count</a> == 1, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Span counter corrupted&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2893"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;blocks&#95;start = <a href="#ab4225911698b67188e1538c334cfe16c">pointer&#95;offset</a>(span, <a href="#a645356809d937167848705edabde7d44">SPAN&#95;HEADER&#95;SIZE</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2894"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uint32&#95;t block&#95;offset = (uint32&#95;t)<a href="#af51a6ed47e80b1b57187f1d5be6c8b4c">pointer&#95;diff</a>(p, blocks&#95;start);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2895"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uint32&#95;t block&#95;idx = block&#95;offset / span-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/span-t/#a97df83853dc6ddf7e0114691b15edb49">block&#95;size</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2896"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/unifyloopexits-cpp/#a4741a07a0e5675f89cfed122008e0a76">block</a> =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2897"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="#ab4225911698b67188e1538c334cfe16c">pointer&#95;offset</a>(blocks&#95;start, (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)block&#95;idx &#42; span-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/span-t/#a97df83853dc6ddf7e0114691b15edb49">block&#95;size</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2898"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!oldsize)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2899"><span class="doxyHighlight">        oldsize =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2900"><span class="doxyHighlight">            (size&#95;t)((ptrdiff&#95;t)span-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/span-t/#a97df83853dc6ddf7e0114691b15edb49">block&#95;size</a> - <a href="#af51a6ed47e80b1b57187f1d5be6c8b4c">pointer&#95;diff</a>(p, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/unifyloopexits-cpp/#a4741a07a0e5675f89cfed122008e0a76">block</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2901"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)span-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/span-t/#a97df83853dc6ddf7e0114691b15edb49">block&#95;size</a> &gt;= <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmreflect-cpp/#ac934769d93af95250952646a3829df4c">size</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2902"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Still fits in block, never mind trying to save memory, but preserve</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2903"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// data if alignment changed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2904"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((p != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/unifyloopexits-cpp/#a4741a07a0e5675f89cfed122008e0a76">block</a>) &amp;&amp; !(flags &amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/rpmalloc/rpmalloc-h/#affda05352198b9ef86d42be851a1349f">RPMALLOC&#95;NO&#95;PRESERVE</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2905"><span class="doxyHighlight">          memmove(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/unifyloopexits-cpp/#a4741a07a0e5675f89cfed122008e0a76">block</a>, p, oldsize);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2906"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/unifyloopexits-cpp/#a4741a07a0e5675f89cfed122008e0a76">block</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2907"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2908"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (span-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/span-t/#a5a977febdd2e9ae15bcf66f83d0cf817">size&#95;class</a> == <a href="#a3f84dd23eb0ef3cf54aeb6afff0618ae">SIZE&#95;CLASS&#95;LARGE</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2909"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Large block</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2912"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (total&#95;size &amp; (<a href="#a3f784cd2178650b1990ea81980646a3b">&#95;memory&#95;span&#95;mask</a> - 1))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2913"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ++num&#95;spans;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2914"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> current&#95;spans = span-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/span-t/#ae77d9a2cdd2a2fd46e3b27739d6c88cc">span&#95;count</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2915"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/unifyloopexits-cpp/#a4741a07a0e5675f89cfed122008e0a76">block</a> = <a href="#ab4225911698b67188e1538c334cfe16c">pointer&#95;offset</a>(span, <a href="#a645356809d937167848705edabde7d44">SPAN&#95;HEADER&#95;SIZE</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2916"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!oldsize)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2917"><span class="doxyHighlight">        oldsize = (current&#95;spans &#42; <a href="#a58df6aa2dfcdd796fd55cd102fdb177f">&#95;memory&#95;span&#95;size</a>) -</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2918"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)<a href="#af51a6ed47e80b1b57187f1d5be6c8b4c">pointer&#95;diff</a>(p, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/unifyloopexits-cpp/#a4741a07a0e5675f89cfed122008e0a76">block</a>) - <a href="#a645356809d937167848705edabde7d44">SPAN&#95;HEADER&#95;SIZE</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2919"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((current&#95;spans &gt;= num&#95;spans) &amp;&amp; (total&#95;size &gt;= (oldsize / 2))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2920"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Still fits in block, never mind trying to save memory, but preserve</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2921"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// data if alignment changed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2922"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((p != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/unifyloopexits-cpp/#a4741a07a0e5675f89cfed122008e0a76">block</a>) &amp;&amp; !(flags &amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/rpmalloc/rpmalloc-h/#affda05352198b9ef86d42be851a1349f">RPMALLOC&#95;NO&#95;PRESERVE</a>))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2924"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/unifyloopexits-cpp/#a4741a07a0e5675f89cfed122008e0a76">block</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2925"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2926"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2927"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Oversized block</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2930"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (total&#95;size &amp; (<a href="#a3667b745f7290a10ff5c5a71575533d9">&#95;memory&#95;page&#95;size</a> - 1))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2931"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ++num&#95;pages;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2932"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Page count is stored in span&#95;count</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2933"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> current&#95;pages = span-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/span-t/#ae77d9a2cdd2a2fd46e3b27739d6c88cc">span&#95;count</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2934"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/unifyloopexits-cpp/#a4741a07a0e5675f89cfed122008e0a76">block</a> = <a href="#ab4225911698b67188e1538c334cfe16c">pointer&#95;offset</a>(span, <a href="#a645356809d937167848705edabde7d44">SPAN&#95;HEADER&#95;SIZE</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2935"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!oldsize)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2936"><span class="doxyHighlight">        oldsize = (current&#95;pages &#42; <a href="#a3667b745f7290a10ff5c5a71575533d9">&#95;memory&#95;page&#95;size</a>) -</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2937"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)<a href="#af51a6ed47e80b1b57187f1d5be6c8b4c">pointer&#95;diff</a>(p, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/unifyloopexits-cpp/#a4741a07a0e5675f89cfed122008e0a76">block</a>) - <a href="#a645356809d937167848705edabde7d44">SPAN&#95;HEADER&#95;SIZE</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2939"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Still fits in block, never mind trying to save memory, but preserve</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2940"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// data if alignment changed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2941"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((p != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/unifyloopexits-cpp/#a4741a07a0e5675f89cfed122008e0a76">block</a>) &amp;&amp; !(flags &amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/rpmalloc/rpmalloc-h/#affda05352198b9ef86d42be851a1349f">RPMALLOC&#95;NO&#95;PRESERVE</a>))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2943"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/unifyloopexits-cpp/#a4741a07a0e5675f89cfed122008e0a76">block</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2944"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2945"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2946"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2947"><span class="doxyHighlight">    oldsize = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2948"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02949" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2949"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02950" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2950"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!!(flags &amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/rpmalloc/rpmalloc-h/#ab3774a093749aeca1d4e387b11e79395">RPMALLOC&#95;GROW&#95;OR&#95;FAIL</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02951" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2951"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2952"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2953"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Size is greater than block size, need to allocate a new block and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02954" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2954"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// deallocate the old Avoid hysteresis by overallocating if increase is small</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02955" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2955"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (below 37%)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02956" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2956"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> lower&#95;bound = oldsize + (oldsize &gt;&gt; 2) + (oldsize &gt;&gt; 3);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02957" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2957"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> new&#95;size =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02958" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2958"><span class="doxyHighlight">      (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmreflect-cpp/#ac934769d93af95250952646a3829df4c">size</a> &gt; lower&#95;bound) ? <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmreflect-cpp/#ac934769d93af95250952646a3829df4c">size</a> : ((<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmreflect-cpp/#ac934769d93af95250952646a3829df4c">size</a> &gt; oldsize) ? lower&#95;bound : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmreflect-cpp/#ac934769d93af95250952646a3829df4c">size</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02959" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2959"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/unifyloopexits-cpp/#a4741a07a0e5675f89cfed122008e0a76">block</a> = <a href="#a3bef7e16a625f1968110eaf331332eb2">&#95;rpmalloc&#95;allocate</a>(heap, new&#95;size);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02960" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2960"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (p &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/unifyloopexits-cpp/#a4741a07a0e5675f89cfed122008e0a76">block</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02961" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2961"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!(flags &amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/rpmalloc/rpmalloc-h/#affda05352198b9ef86d42be851a1349f">RPMALLOC&#95;NO&#95;PRESERVE</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02962" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2962"><span class="doxyHighlight">      memcpy(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/unifyloopexits-cpp/#a4741a07a0e5675f89cfed122008e0a76">block</a>, p, oldsize &lt; new&#95;size ? oldsize : new&#95;size);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02963" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2963"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="#ae324fa158db468143544693dfe539800">&#95;rpmalloc&#95;deallocate</a>(p);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02964" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2964"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02965" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2965"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02966" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2966"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/unifyloopexits-cpp/#a4741a07a0e5675f89cfed122008e0a76">block</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02967" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2967"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02968" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2968"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02969" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2969" lineLink="#a27aafcff5a8ed8f91ea6b53ac93a0fbf"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="#a27aafcff5a8ed8f91ea6b53ac93a0fbf">&#95;rpmalloc&#95;aligned&#95;reallocate</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/heap-t">heap&#95;t</a> &#42;heap, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;ptr,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02970" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2970"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> alignment, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmreflect-cpp/#ac934769d93af95250952646a3829df4c">size</a>,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02972" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2972"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (alignment &lt;= <a href="#a000afcda168a6fd19a9435e049508463">SMALL&#95;GRANULARITY</a>)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02974" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2974"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02975" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2975"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> no&#95;alloc = !!(flags &amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/rpmalloc/rpmalloc-h/#ab3774a093749aeca1d4e387b11e79395">RPMALLOC&#95;GROW&#95;OR&#95;FAIL</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02976" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2976"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> usablesize = (ptr ? <a href="#adc5743a6b15192da5b7e023f85360208">&#95;rpmalloc&#95;usable&#95;size</a>(ptr) : 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02977" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2977"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((usablesize &gt;= <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmreflect-cpp/#ac934769d93af95250952646a3829df4c">size</a>) &amp;&amp; !((uintptr&#95;t)ptr &amp; (alignment - 1))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02978" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2978"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (no&#95;alloc || (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmreflect-cpp/#ac934769d93af95250952646a3829df4c">size</a> &gt;= (usablesize / 2)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02979" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2979"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ptr;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02981" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2981"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Aligned alloc marks span as having aligned blocks</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02983" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2983"><span class="doxyHighlight">      (!no&#95;alloc ? <a href="#a4c63f26f6c18bccde67513ce760b613a">&#95;rpmalloc&#95;aligned&#95;allocate</a>(heap, alignment, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmreflect-cpp/#ac934769d93af95250952646a3829df4c">size</a>) : 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02984" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2984"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a90593dceacf0c04f14d084bed7e7eabe">EXPECTED</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/unifyloopexits-cpp/#a4741a07a0e5675f89cfed122008e0a76">block</a> != 0)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3005"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (span-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/span-t/#a5a977febdd2e9ae15bcf66f83d0cf817">size&#95;class</a> &lt; <a href="#aa74d427b2b9955ff2d9719693d9fc80e">SIZE&#95;CLASS&#95;COUNT</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3006"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Small/medium block</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3014"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (current&#95;spans &#42; <a href="#a58df6aa2dfcdd796fd55cd102fdb177f">&#95;memory&#95;span&#95;size</a>) - (size&#95;t)<a href="#af51a6ed47e80b1b57187f1d5be6c8b4c">pointer&#95;diff</a>(p, span);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3020"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3021"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//! Adjust and optimize the size class properties for the given class</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3022" lineLink="#a223c890fd871bff9081258f6520fc8a9"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a223c890fd871bff9081258f6520fc8a9">&#95;rpmalloc&#95;adjust&#95;size&#95;class</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> iclass) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3023"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> block&#95;size = <a href="#a33cddb08b9ee0f969cc82dbf9cddb947">&#95;memory&#95;size&#95;class</a>&#91;iclass&#93;.block&#95;size;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3024"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> block&#95;count = (<a href="#a58df6aa2dfcdd796fd55cd102fdb177f">&#95;memory&#95;span&#95;size</a> - <a href="#a645356809d937167848705edabde7d44">SPAN&#95;HEADER&#95;SIZE</a>) / block&#95;size;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3025"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3026"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="#a33cddb08b9ee0f969cc82dbf9cddb947">&#95;memory&#95;size&#95;class</a>&#91;iclass&#93;.block&#95;count = (uint16&#95;t)block&#95;count;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3027"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="#a33cddb08b9ee0f969cc82dbf9cddb947">&#95;memory&#95;size&#95;class</a>&#91;iclass&#93;.class&#95;idx = (uint16&#95;t)iclass;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3028"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3029"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if previous size classes can be merged</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3030"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (iclass &gt;= <a href="#afef7a20458b75404cdbba364a751694a">SMALL&#95;CLASS&#95;COUNT</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3031"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> prevclass = iclass;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3032"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (prevclass &gt; 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3033"><span class="doxyHighlight">      --prevclass;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3034"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A class can be merged if number of pages and number of blocks are equal</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3035"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a33cddb08b9ee0f969cc82dbf9cddb947">&#95;memory&#95;size&#95;class</a>&#91;prevclass&#93;.block&#95;count ==</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3036"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="#a33cddb08b9ee0f969cc82dbf9cddb947">&#95;memory&#95;size&#95;class</a>&#91;iclass&#93;.block&#95;count)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3037"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="#a8458c6b330ad96112bceb468802e8eb4">&#95;rpmalloc&#95;memcpy&#95;const</a>(<a href="#a33cddb08b9ee0f969cc82dbf9cddb947">&#95;memory&#95;size&#95;class</a> + prevclass,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3038"><span class="doxyHighlight">                               <a href="#a33cddb08b9ee0f969cc82dbf9cddb947">&#95;memory&#95;size&#95;class</a> + iclass,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3039"><span class="doxyHighlight">                               </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="#a33cddb08b9ee0f969cc82dbf9cddb947">&#95;memory&#95;size&#95;class</a>&#91;iclass&#93;));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3040"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3041"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3042"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3043"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3044"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3045"></CodeLine>
